20e3eff7751910148366dfb349020b4c.content:
LOWER Function (String)

Converts all characters in a string to lowercase.

Syntax

LOWER(<str>)

Description

Converts all characters in <str> to lowercase.

The LOWER function is identical to the LCASE function.

Example

This example converts the given string AnT to lowercase, and returns the value ant: 

SELECT LOWER ('AnT') "lower" FROM DUMMY;
Related Information
Character String Data Types
Copyright | Important Disclaimers and Legal Information
20e3eff7751910148366dfb349020b4c.description: Converts all characters in a string to lowercase.
20e3eff7751910148366dfb349020b4c.title: LOWER Function (String)

f59d04cc4cc740ed80fbfd4b422f9842.content:
ABAP_LOWER Function (String)

Converts all characters in a specified string to lowercase.

Syntax

ABAP_LOWER(<str>)

Syntax Elements

<str>
The string to convert to lowercase.

Description

Converts all characters in the <str> parameter to lowercase.

Example

The following example converts the given string to lowercase and returns the value ant: 

SELECT ABAP_LOWER ('AnT') "lower" FROM DUMMY;
Related Information
Character String Data Types
Copyright | Important Disclaimers and Legal Information
f59d04cc4cc740ed80fbfd4b422f9842.description: Converts all characters in a specified string to lowercase.
f59d04cc4cc740ed80fbfd4b422f9842.title: ABAP_LOWER Function (String)

20e23edf7519101490eee3271722de36.content:
LCASE Function (String)

Converts all characters in a string to lowercase.

Syntax

LCASE(<str>)

Description

Converts all characters in string <str> to lowercase.

The LCASE function is identical to the LOWER function.

Example

This example converts all characters of the given string TesT to lowercase and returns the value test. 

SELECT LCASE ('TesT') "lcase" FROM DUMMY;
Related Information
Character String Data Types
Copyright | Important Disclaimers and Legal Information
20e23edf7519101490eee3271722de36.description: Converts all characters in a string to lowercase.
20e23edf7519101490eee3271722de36.title: LCASE Function (String)

d1e67902534d426180459ae45a264667.content:
INITCAP Function (String)

Converts the first character of each word in a specified string to uppercase and converts remaining characters to lowercase.

Syntax

INITCAP(<inputString>)

Syntax Elements

<inputString>

Specifies the string to be converted. <inputString> can be either a VARCHAR or NVARCHAR value. 

<inputString> ::= <string>

Description

A word is delimited by any of the following characters:

  • Blank space

  • New line

  • Form feed

  • Carriage return

  • Line feed

  • Any of the following: ! " # $ % & ' ( ) * + , − . / : ; < = > ? @ [ \ ] ^ _ ` { | } ~

Example

The following query returns The Example One: 

SELECT INITCAP('the EXAMPLE one') FROM DUMMY;
Copyright | Important Disclaimers and Legal Information
d1e67902534d426180459ae45a264667.description: Converts the first character of each word in a specified string to uppercase and converts remaining characters to lowercase.
d1e67902534d426180459ae45a264667.title: INITCAP Function (String)

fae69658704942bdadc54fc70c270241.content:
Delegating Workflows Automatically

By delegating your workflows, you forward your workflows to another user in the company so that they can approve or decline the workflows on your behalf. You can enable automatic delegation where all your workflows are automatically delegated to a specific user, for example, your assistant or another member of your team.

Prerequisites

The admin has enabled delegation for this workflow object: the Is Delegate Supported field is set to Yes.

You have the Allow Auto Delegation permission.

Context

In addition to delegating all your workflows automatically, you can also delegate an individual workflow to a particular user of the Workflow Details page of that workflow request.

After a workflow request is manually or automatically delegated, you can still withdraw the delegation and the delegate can refuse the delegation.

Procedure

  1. Go to Home Page  Quick Links   Available  Auto Delegate .

    You can also save Auto Delegate as a favorite link.

  2. Turn on automatic delegation and select a delegate by user name search.
  3. Select OK to finish.

Results

All your workflows will be automatically delegated to the selected user. You can turn off automatic delegation when you don't need it.

    Delegate Search for Employees on Global Assignment or Concurrent Employment
    When performing people searches to find a delegate for your workflow request, any employee who is on Global Assignment or Concurrent Employment appear as one record.
Related Information
Creating an Individual Workflow
fae69658704942bdadc54fc70c270241.description: By delegating your workflows, you forward your workflows to another user in the company so that they can approve or decline the workflows on your behalf. You can enable automatic delegation where all your workflows are automatically delegated to a specific user, for example, your assistant or another member of your team.

b4398932d8b24306a42ed4d35f8c4bca.content:
Extending Maximum Length of Alert Messages

The default length of alert messages is 255 characters. To be able to define a longer text for the alert messages, extend the field length to 4000.

Prerequisites

You have the Configure Object Definitions permission. You can find in under Administrator Permissions  Metadata Framework in the Manage Permission Roles admin tool.

Procedure

  1. Go to Admin Center  Configure Object Definition and edit the Alert Message object.
  2. Change the field length to 4000 for the following fields:

    • alertDescription

      Message description field for current sign-in locale

    • alertDescriptionLocalizaed

      Message description field for other locales

  3. Save your changes.

Results

The field length for the alert messages has been extended. You can now define a message as long as 4000 characters.
Related Information
List of Role-Based Permissions
b4398932d8b24306a42ed4d35f8c4bca.description: The default length of alert messages is 255 characters. To be able to define a longer text for the alert messages, extend the field length to 4000.
b4398932d8b24306a42ed4d35f8c4bca.title: Extending Maximum Length of Alert Messages

5db1a340fcd140949eae67b6ecf94bb8.content:
Creating Custom Templates with Document Generation

The Document Generation feature enables you to create and manage custom documents, including workflow email templates, where you can flexibly define and include text and even images. Being able to create and assign templates more flexibly, you can customize the notification text for different participant types.

Prerequisites

You have enabled the Document Generation feature.

You have the following permissions:

  • The Configure Business Rules permission

  • The relevant Manage Document Generation permissions

Context

This procedure only includes the overall steps of manage your custom templates using Document Generation. For detailed steps and options, please see the Employee Central Document Generation guide.

Procedure

  1. Create a Document Generation Group for a particular workflow notification purpose, for example, approval notifications for maternity leave.
  2. Create a Document Generation Template and associate it with the group you have created.

    Make sure that you only associate one template to a group. You will later assign the group to a workflow email configuration and the system uses the template in the group to generate the relevant email notifications.

  3. If you plan to distinguish notification email content sent to different workflow participants or sent for different workflow actions, create more templates and groups as needed.

    For example, you can create one template for the workflow initiator and another for workflow approver when an approval step is completed. Moreover, for the same role, the workflow initiator, you can have templates for different workflow actions, for example, one for step approval and another for the final approval.

Results

The Document Generation Group has been associated with the Document Generation Template. When you create a workflow email configuration, the Document Generation Group is available for selection as custom templates.

Next Steps

Assign the Document Generation Groups in a workflow email configuration.


Task overview: Defining Workflow Email Notifications
Related Information
Working with Standard Templates
Creating a Workflow Email Configuration

Being able to create and assign templates more flexibly, you can customize the notification text for different participant types.
